name: Diamond Forge
pages: The Diamond forge is 4x more faster than the vanilla furnace, with 2 additional smelting slots, below is the recipe for it. This forge can use any of these $(l:upgrades)upgrades/$, and requires the $(l:patchouli:furnaces/diamond_furnace)diamond furnace/$ to craft. Additionally it requires 2 $(l:patchouli:items/gold_conductor_block)gold conductor blocks/$ in its recipe.
